Zahi Hawass , reached by phone early Monday, dismissed such claims as being exaggerated. The damage at Saqqara is not really much. I'm not worried at all. Everything is going to be safe today and tomorrow the situation will be finished, said Zahi Hawass , also a National Geographic Society explorer-in-residence.( The National Geographic Society owns National Geographic Society News.) Andy Coulson denies being aware of any wrongdoing at the paper, part of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp media group, and police said last month there was not enough evidence to charge him with any crime. Obviously when he was editor of the News of the World, bad things happened at that newspaper and when he found about those, he resigned. That was the right thing to do, David Cameron told BBC Radio 4's Today program.`` I gave him a second chance,'' David Cameron added.`` I think he has done a good job for the government and for the country.
